requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10，11
  • Processor: ntel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce750GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10，11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4700MQ @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 755M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: Lowest specs tested. Lesser specs may still work
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 740

  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720, 32-bit colour

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.5 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720, 32-bit colour
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
